H0.text: Who succeeded Nelson Mandela as South African president. Cyril Ramaphosa

H1.text: Who succeeded Nelson Mandela as South African president. Desmond Tutu

H2.text: Who succeeded Nelson Mandela as South African president. Mangosuthu Buthelezi

H3.text: Who succeeded Nelson Mandela as South African president. Thabo Mbeki

A4.text: he was elected unopposed as ANC president in 1997, enabling his rise to the presidency as the ANC's candidate in the 1999 elections

A5.text: he served as the president of South Africa from 14 June 1999 to 24 September 2008
